Alpine Components
  • Checkbox
  • Datepicker
  • Dropdown
  • Dropdown context
  • Input
  • Modal
  • Pagination
  • Progress
  • Table
  • Tabs

Table

The table component is used to generate tables from arrays. Tables can be static or include features like filtering, sorting, pagination, reordering and others.

Example 
<table
  x-data="table($store.table)"
  class="table-auto border-collapse text-left w-full text-[0.9rem]"
>
  <thead>
    <tr>
      <template x-for="col in definition">
        <td
          x-bind="header"
          class="border-b border-gray-300 px-2 py-2 font-semibold dark:border-neutral-700 dark:text-gray-200"
        >
          <div class="flex items-center">
            <span x-text="col.label"></span>
            <template x-if="isSortable() && !isSorted()">
              <svg
                xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"
                viewBox="0 0 320 512"
                class="ml-3 h-4 w-4 opacity-30"
              >
                <path
                  d="M137.4 41.4c12.5-12.5 32.8-12.5 45.3 0l128 128c9.2 9.2 11.9 22.9 6.9 34.9s-16.6 19.8-29.6 19.8L32 224c-12.9 0-24.6-7.8-29.6-19.8s-2.2-25.7 6.9-34.9l128-128zm0 429.3l-128-128c-9.2-9.2-11.9-22.9-6.9-34.9s16.6-19.8 29.6-19.8l256 0c12.9 0 24.6 7.8 29.6 19.8s2.2 25.7-6.9 34.9l-128 128c-12.5 12.5-32.8 12.5-45.3 0z"
                />
              </svg>
            </template>
            <template x-if="isSortedAsc()">
              <svg
                xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"
                viewBox="0 0 320 512"
                class="ml-3 h-4 w-4 opacity-70"
              >
                <path
                  d="M182.6 137.4c-12.5-12.5-32.8-12.5-45.3 0l-128 128c-9.2 9.2-11.9 22.9-6.9 34.9s16.6 19.8 29.6 19.8l256 0c12.9 0 24.6-7.8 29.6-19.8s2.2-25.7-6.9-34.9l-128-128z"
                />
              </svg>
            </template>
            <template x-if="isSortedDesc()">
              <svg
                xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"
                viewBox="0 0 320 512"
                class="ml-3 h-4 w-4 opacity-70"
              >
                <path
                  d="M137.4 374.6c12.5 12.5 32.8 12.5 45.3 0l128-128c9.2-9.2 11.9-22.9 6.9-34.9s-16.6-19.8-29.6-19.8L32 192c-12.9 0-24.6 7.8-29.6 19.8s-2.2 25.7 6.9 34.9l128 128z"
                />
              </svg>
            </template>
          </div>
        </td>
      </template>
    </tr>
  </thead>
  <tbody>
    <template x-for="row in getDataPaginated" :key="row[primaryKey]">
      <tr>
        <template x-for="col in definition">
          <td
            x-text="row[col.key]"
            class="border-t border-gray-300 px-2 py-2 dark:border-neutral-700"
          ></td>
        </template>
      </tr>
    </template>
  </tbody>
</table>


document.addEventListener('alpine:init', () => {
  Alpine.store('table', {
    data: [
      {"id":1,"first_name":"Anthony","last_name":"Linbohm","city":"Makui","department":"Business Development","title":"Quality Engineer"},
      {"id":2,"first_name":"Richard","last_name":"Moult","city":"Xihu","department":"Legal","title":"Budget/Accounting Analyst IV"},
      {"id":3,"first_name":"Chance","last_name":"Dallas","city":"Moncton","department":"Support","title":"Product Engineer"},
      {"id":4,"first_name":"Rozamond","last_name":"Abbatucci","city":"Chico","department":"Legal","title":"Software Consultant"},
      {"id":5,"first_name":"Ashely","last_name":"Petrozzi","city":"Lafia","department":"Services","title":"Staff Accountant III"},
      {"id":6,"first_name":"Bron","last_name":"Siuda","city":"Mora","department":"Accounting","title":"Marketing Manager"},
      {"id":7,"first_name":"Marena","last_name":"Geraldi","city":"Karanganyar","department":"Support","title":"Compensation Analyst"},
      {"id":8,"first_name":"Tomas","last_name":"Donneely","city":"Meirinhas","department":"Services","title":"Research Associate"},
    ],
    primaryKey: 'id',
  })
})

Usage

To use this component simply copy and paste minimal template or any template from the examples below.

The data for the component is provided by the table function in the x-data directive. This function takes single object as argument.

table({
    data: Array,
    primaryKey: String,
    definition: Array,
    filter: String,
    page: Number,
    itemsPerPage: Number,
    onFilter: Function,
})
data
[] Array

Data to display in the table.

primaryKey
empty string String

This prop should be the name of the property that is unique for every record.

definition
[] Array

Table definition is an optional array of objects that defines columns of the table. See the detailed explanation below.

filter
empty string String

String used to filter items.

page
1 Number

Current page number.

itemsPerPage
0 Number

Number of records (rows) on the single page. Setting it to the 0 disables pagination.

onFilter
undefined Function

Function called after filtering. This can be useful, for example to update pagination component. See the example below.

Because of a lot of shared state (filter, pagination etc) it is recomended to set this object as a separate store and then pass it to the table with the $store magic.

Definition

Table definition is an optional array of objects that defines columns of the table. Each object has one required, unique key property and number of optional properties. The key defines which property of the record object will be rendered in the column. If key is not found empty column is added.

If definition is not provided component makes one using the first record of the data. All additional properties are set to default values. This may be enough for simple tables however to use features like sorting, filtering etc you need to provide definition array.

key
empty string String

The key defines which property of the record object will be rendered in the column.

sortable
false Boolean

Enables sorting of the column.

filterable
true Boolean

Enables filtering of the column.

label
undefined String

Sets header for this column. If not provided header is the same as key converted to Header Case.

Example 
<table
  x-data="table($store.tableDefinition)"
  class="table-auto border-collapse text-left w-full text-[0.9rem]"
>
  <thead>
    <tr>
      <template x-for="col in definition">
        <td
          x-bind="header"
          class="border-b border-gray-300 px-2 py-2 font-semibold dark:border-neutral-700 dark:text-gray-200"
        >
          <div class="flex items-center">
            <span x-text="col.label" class="whitespace-nowrap"></span>
            <template x-if="isSortable() && !isSorted()">
              <svg
                xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"
                viewBox="0 0 320 512"
                class="ml-3 h-4 w-4 opacity-30"
              >
                <path
                  d="M137.4 41.4c12.5-12.5 32.8-12.5 45.3 0l128 128c9.2 9.2 11.9 22.9 6.9 34.9s-16.6 19.8-29.6 19.8L32 224c-12.9 0-24.6-7.8-29.6-19.8s-2.2-25.7 6.9-34.9l128-128zm0 429.3l-128-128c-9.2-9.2-11.9-22.9-6.9-34.9s16.6-19.8 29.6-19.8l256 0c12.9 0 24.6 7.8 29.6 19.8s2.2 25.7-6.9 34.9l-128 128c-12.5 12.5-32.8 12.5-45.3 0z"
                />
              </svg>
            </template>
            <template x-if="isSortedAsc()">
              <svg
                xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"
                viewBox="0 0 320 512"
                class="ml-3 h-4 w-4 opacity-70"
              >
                <path
                  d="M182.6 137.4c-12.5-12.5-32.8-12.5-45.3 0l-128 128c-9.2 9.2-11.9 22.9-6.9 34.9s16.6 19.8 29.6 19.8l256 0c12.9 0 24.6-7.8 29.6-19.8s2.2-25.7-6.9-34.9l-128-128z"
                />
              </svg>
            </template>
            <template x-if="isSortedDesc()">
              <svg
                xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"
                viewBox="0 0 320 512"
                class="ml-3 h-4 w-4 opacity-70"
              >
                <path
                  d="M137.4 374.6c12.5 12.5 32.8 12.5 45.3 0l128-128c9.2-9.2 11.9-22.9 6.9-34.9s-16.6-19.8-29.6-19.8L32 192c-12.9 0-24.6 7.8-29.6 19.8s-2.2 25.7 6.9 34.9l128 128z"
                />
              </svg>
            </template>
          </div>
        </td>
      </template>
    </tr>
  </thead>
  <tbody>
    <template x-for="row in getDataPaginated" :key="row[primaryKey]">
      <tr>
        <template x-for="col in definition">
          <td
            class="border-t border-gray-300 px-2 py-2 dark:border-neutral-700"
            >
            <span x-text="row[col.key]"></span>
            <template x-if="col.key === 'status'">
              <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" id="mdi-checkbox-outline" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="currentColor" class="w-5 h-5 text-green-600 mx-auto">
                <path d="M19,3H5A2,2 0 0,0 3,5V19A2,2 0 0,0 5,21H19A2,2 0 0,0 21,19V5A2,2 0 0,0 19,3M19,5V19H5V5H19M10,17L6,13L7.41,11.58L10,14.17L16.59,7.58L18,9" />
              </svg>
            </template>
            <template x-if="col.key === 'edit'">
              <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" id="mdi-account-edit" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="currentColor" class="w-5 h-5 mx-auto">
                <path d="M21.7,13.35L20.7,14.35L18.65,12.3L19.65,11.3C19.86,11.09 20.21,11.09 20.42,11.3L21.7,12.58C21.91,12.79 21.91,13.14 21.7,13.35M12,18.94L18.06,12.88L20.11,14.93L14.06,21H12V18.94M12,14C7.58,14 4,15.79 4,18V20H10V18.11L14,14.11C13.34,14.03 12.67,14 12,14M12,4A4,4 0 0,0 8,8A4,4 0 0,0 12,12A4,4 0 0,0 16,8A4,4 0 0,0 12,4Z" />
              </svg>
            </template>
          </td>
        </template>
      </tr>
    </template>
  </tbody>
</table>


document.addEventListener('alpine:init', () => {
  Alpine.store('tableDefinition', {
    data: [
      {"id":1,"first_name":"Anthony","last_name":"Linbohm","city":"Makui","department":"Business Development","title":"Quality Engineer"},
      {"id":2,"first_name":"Richard","last_name":"Moult","city":"Xihu","department":"Legal","title":"Budget/Accounting Analyst IV"},
      {"id":3,"first_name":"Chance","last_name":"Dallas","city":"Moncton","department":"Support","title":"Product Engineer"},
      {"id":4,"first_name":"Rozamond","last_name":"Abbatucci","city":"Chico","department":"Legal","title":"Software Consultant"},
      {"id":5,"first_name":"Ashely","last_name":"Petrozzi","city":"Lafia","department":"Services","title":"Staff Accountant III"},
      {"id":6,"first_name":"Bron","last_name":"Siuda","city":"Mora","department":"Accounting","title":"Marketing Manager"},
      {"id":7,"first_name":"Marena","last_name":"Geraldi","city":"Karanganyar","department":"Support","title":"Compensation Analyst"},
      {"id":8,"first_name":"Tomas","last_name":"Donneely","city":"Meirinhas","department":"Services","title":"Research Associate"},
      {"id":9,"first_name":"Umberto","last_name":"Cohalan","city":"Cuamba","department":"Research and Development","title":"Chemical Engineer"},
      {"id":10,"first_name":"Nicola","last_name":"Flippelli","city":"Faqrwli","department":"Human Resources","title":"VP Quality Control"},
    ],
    primaryKey: 'id',
    definition: [
      {
        key: 'status',
        label: 'Status',
      },
      {
        key: 'first_name',
        label: 'First name',
        sortable: true,
      },
      {
        key: 'last_name',
        label: 'Last name',
        sortable: true,
      },
      {
        key: 'title',
        sortable: true,
      },
      {
        key: 'department',
        sortable: true,
      },
      {
        key: 'edit',
        label: 'Edit',
      }
    ]
  })
})

Pagination and filtering

To enable pagination set itemsPerPage to any number greater than 0. Current page can be changed with the page prop. In the following example current page of the table is controlled by the pagination component.

Filtering is enabled by default for all columns. Data is filtered depending on the string in the filter prop. Every time data is filtered onFilter callback is also called. You can use it to update number of pages in the pagination component.

Example 
<div
  x-data="input({
    placeholder: 'Filter',
  })"
  x-model="$store.tableFilterPagination.filter"
  class="flex flex-1 items-center rounded border border-gray-300 bg-white px-3 py-2 outline-none transition-shadow duration-200 focus-within:border-gray-400 focus-within:ring focus-within:ring-violet-200 focus:outline-none dark:border-neutral-600 dark:bg-neutral-800 dark:text-gray-300 dark:focus-within:ring-violet-300"
>
  <div class="flex flex-1 flex-wrap">
    <input
      x-bind="input"
      type="text"
      class="min-w-0 flex-1 border-0 bg-transparent p-0 outline-none focus:min-w-[64px] focus:outline-none"
    />
  </div>
  <div class="flex items-center">
    <div>
      <button @click="clear()" class="flex items-center">
        <svg
          xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"
          width="16"
          height="16"
          fill="currentColor"
          class="h-5 w-5 opacity-70"
          viewBox="0 0 16 16"
        >
          <path
            d="M2.146 2.854a.5.5 0 1 1 .708-.708L8 7.293l5.146-5.147a.5.5 0 0 1 .708.708L8.707 8l5.147 5.146a.5.5 0 0 1-.708.708L8 8.707l-5.146 5.147a.5.5 0 0 1-.708-.708L7.293 8z"
          />
        </svg>
      </button>
    </div>
  </div>
</div>

<table
  x-data="table($store.tableFilterPagination)"
  class="table-auto border-collapse text-left mt-4 mb-6 w-full text-[0.9rem]"
>
  <thead>
    <tr>
      <template x-for="col in definition">
        <td
          x-bind="header"
          class="border-b border-gray-300 px-2 py-2 font-semibold dark:border-neutral-700 dark:text-gray-200"
        >
          <div class="flex items-center">
            <span x-text="col.label"></span>
            <template x-if="isSortable() && !isSorted()">
              <svg
                xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"
                viewBox="0 0 320 512"
                class="ml-3 h-4 w-4 opacity-30"
              >
                <path
                  d="M137.4 41.4c12.5-12.5 32.8-12.5 45.3 0l128 128c9.2 9.2 11.9 22.9 6.9 34.9s-16.6 19.8-29.6 19.8L32 224c-12.9 0-24.6-7.8-29.6-19.8s-2.2-25.7 6.9-34.9l128-128zm0 429.3l-128-128c-9.2-9.2-11.9-22.9-6.9-34.9s16.6-19.8 29.6-19.8l256 0c12.9 0 24.6 7.8 29.6 19.8s2.2 25.7-6.9 34.9l-128 128c-12.5 12.5-32.8 12.5-45.3 0z"
                />
              </svg>
            </template>
            <template x-if="isSortedAsc()">
              <svg
                xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"
                viewBox="0 0 320 512"
                class="ml-3 h-4 w-4 opacity-70"
              >
                <path
                  d="M182.6 137.4c-12.5-12.5-32.8-12.5-45.3 0l-128 128c-9.2 9.2-11.9 22.9-6.9 34.9s16.6 19.8 29.6 19.8l256 0c12.9 0 24.6-7.8 29.6-19.8s2.2-25.7-6.9-34.9l-128-128z"
                />
              </svg>
            </template>
            <template x-if="isSortedDesc()">
              <svg
                xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"
                viewBox="0 0 320 512"
                class="ml-3 h-4 w-4 opacity-70"
              >
                <path
                  d="M137.4 374.6c12.5 12.5 32.8 12.5 45.3 0l128-128c9.2-9.2 11.9-22.9 6.9-34.9s-16.6-19.8-29.6-19.8L32 192c-12.9 0-24.6 7.8-29.6 19.8s-2.2 25.7 6.9 34.9l128 128z"
                />
              </svg>
            </template>
          </div>
        </td>
      </template>
    </tr>
  </thead>
  <tbody>
    <template x-for="row in getDataPaginated" :key="row[primaryKey]">
      <tr>
        <template x-for="col in definition">
          <td
            x-text="row[col.key]"
            class="border-t border-gray-300 px-2 py-2 dark:border-neutral-700"
          ></td>
        </template>
      </tr>
    </template>
  </tbody>
</table>

<nav x-data="pagination({
      itemsCount: () => $store.tableFilterPagination.filteredItemsCount,
      itemsPerPage: () => $store.tableFilterPagination.itemsPerPage,
      maxPages: 7,
    })" 
    x-model="$store.tableFilterPagination.page"
    class="relative z-0 flex w-auto"
>
  <a
    x-bind="prevButton"
    class="flex w-12 cursor-pointer flex-col items-center justify-center rounded-md border border-gray-300 p-2 text-sm font-medium hover:bg-gray-50 dark:border-neutral-700 dark:text-gray-300 dark:hover:bg-neutral-700 mr-0.5"
  >
    <svg
      xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"
      width="16"
      height="16"
      fill="currentColor"
      class="bi bi-chevron-left"
      viewBox="0 0 16 16"
    >
      <path
        fill-rule="evenodd"
        d="M11.354 1.646a.5.5 0 0 1 0 .708L5.707 8l5.647 5.646a.5.5 0 0 1-.708.708l-6-6a.5.5 0 0 1 0-.708l6-6a.5.5 0 0 1 .708 0"
      />
    </svg>
  </a>
  <template x-for="page in getPages">
    <a
      x-bind="pageButton"
      x-text="page"
      class="dark:border-neutral-70 z-10 mx-0.5 flex h-10 w-12 flex-none cursor-pointer items-center justify-center rounded-md border border-gray-300 text-sm font-semibold transition-shadow hover:bg-gray-50 dark:text-gray-300 dark:hover:bg-neutral-700"
      class:selected="ring-2 font-semibold text-white bg-violet-500 hover:bg-violet-400 dark:bg-violet-500 dark:hover:bg-violet-300 border-violet-200 ring-violet-200 dark:text-gray-100 dark:border-violet-500 dark:ring-violet-100"
    >
    </a>
  </template>
  <a
    x-bind="nextButton"
    class="flex w-12 cursor-pointer flex-col items-center justify-center rounded-md border border-gray-300 p-2 text-sm font-medium hover:bg-gray-50 dark:border-neutral-700 dark:text-gray-300 dark:hover:bg-neutral-700 ml-0.5"
  >
    <svg
      xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"
      width="16"
      height="16"
      fill="currentColor"
      class="bi bi-chevron-right"
      viewBox="0 0 16 16"
    >
      <path
        fill-rule="evenodd"
        d="M4.646 1.646a.5.5 0 0 1 .708 0l6 6a.5.5 0 0 1 0 .708l-6 6a.5.5 0 0 1-.708-.708L10.293 8 4.646 2.354a.5.5 0 0 1 0-.708"
      />
    </svg>
  </a>
</nav>
